<title level="1" pfs="">[Aukashungi Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2122)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 29

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Aukashungi Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2122)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 50</row>

**Perception** +18; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 210

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 10, slashing 10

**Weaknesses**
area damage 10, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, burrow 35 feet

**Burrowing Agony** <actions string="Single Action" />  The swarm deals 4d6 piercing damage and 2d4 persistent bleed damage to every creature in its space (DC 29 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The first time per round that a creature is affected by an aukashungi swarm's Burrowing Agony, the creature is also exposed to expeditious evolution.

**Expeditious Evolution**  ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) This affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor the damage from it healed, until successfully treated with [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250) or a similar effect; the affliction can then be removed as normal for a disease. **Saving Throw** DC 27 Fortitude; **Stage 1** The aukashungi swarm chooses two of the victim's ability modifiers (such as Strength and Charisma). The victim gains a +1 status bonus to any skill checks that use those ability modifiers. The victim takes a –1 status penalty to all other skill checks (1 day); **Stage 2** The  status penalty increases to –2 (1 day); **Stage 3** The status bonus increases to +2, and the penalty increases to –3 (1 day); **Stage 4** The status penalty increases to –4 (1 day).

</column>
name: Aukashungi Swarm

text: Aukashungi Swarm Recall Knowledge - Aberration (Occultism): DC 29 Unspecific Lore : DC 27 Specific Lore : DC 24 Aukashungi Swarm Source Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 50 Perception +18; greater darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Skills Athletics +20 Str +4 Dex +6 Con +5 Int -4 Wis +1 Cha -2 --- AC 28 Fort +17 Ref +24 Will +13 HP 210 Immunities precision, swarm mind Resistances bludgeoning 5, piercing 10, slashing 10 Weaknesses area damage 10, splash damage 10 --- Speed 35 feet, burrow 35 feet Burrowing Agony Single Action The swarm deals 4d6 piercing damage and 2d4 persistent bleed damage to every creature in its space (DC 29 basic Reflex save). The first time per round that a creature is affected by an aukashungi swarm's Burrowing Agony, the creature is also exposed to expeditious evolution. Expeditious Evolution (Curse, Disease) This affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor the damage from it healed, until successfully treated with remove curse or a similar effect; the affliction can then be removed as normal for a disease. Saving Throw DC 27 Fortitude; Stage 1 The aukashungi swarm chooses two of the victim's ability modifiers (such as Strength and Charisma). The victim gains a +1 status bonus to any skill checks that use those ability modifiers. The victim takes a –1 status penalty to all other skill checks (1 day); Stage 2 The status penalty increases to –2 (1 day); Stage 3 The status bonus increases to +2, and the penalty increases to –3 (1 day); Stage 4 The status penalty increases to –4 (1 day).
